ej,cox-b103,M,guccc901,Balls and strikes $Braves pitcher Buddy Carlyle appeared upset with the strike zone of HP umpire Chris Guccione, who walked out and said something to Carlyle; Braves manager Bobby Cox yelled from the dugout and was ejected by Guccione. ej,cox-b103,M,westj901,Objecting to delay to turn on field lights $umpire crew chief Joe West ordered the lights to be turned on and Braves manager Bobby Cox objected to the delay after his new pitcher had warmed up; Cox was ejected by West
Debut game for Francisley Bueno

$Alfonso Soriano stood at the plate watching his long fly ball, evidently thinking it was a home run; when it hit the fence, Soriano only reached first base; he was booed by Cubs fans and apologized to his teammates later

ej,buenf001,P,rapue901,Throwing a pitch behind Alfonso Soriano $the first pitch by Francisley Bueno to Alfonso Soriano was behind Soriano's head, which was possible retaliation for Soriano's pose at the plate in the previous inning; Bueno was ejected by HP umpire Ed Rapuano; this was Bueno's first game in the majors
